Text.Page:
The weapons may not have worked, but this time I have a plan to win Nascha's heart that's foolproof!

Kaidun awards his strongest and fiercest officers with special rank insignias. Nashwa couldn't refuse such a prize! Would you get them from the {@LinkCreature:32#15#Sihran loyalists} for me? I'd go...but...you've already proven you can handle this sort of thing.
Nashwa will surely fall in love with me when I bring her these! I can't thank you enough, but this reward is a start!
All I need are the rank insignias worn by the {@LinkCreature:32#15#Sihran loyalists} and Nashwa will see I do care about her. Right?
